title: Towards Evaluating and Building Versatile Large Language Models for Medicine

abstract: In this study, we present MedS-Bench, a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate the performance of large language models (LLMs) in clinical contexts. Unlike existing benchmarks that focus on multiple-choice question answering, MedS …

title: MOSS-MED: Medical Multimodal Model Serving Medical Image Analysis

abstract: The remarkable advancements in large language models (LLMs) and large-scale visual encoders have laid a solid foundation for enhancing the capabilities of artificial intelligence (AI) in various application scenarios. In this study, we introduce MOSS …
